General.Name: Kingfa Science & Technology (India) Limited
General.Description: Kingfa Science & Technology (India) Limited manufactures and supplies reinforced polypropylene compounds, fiber reinforced composites, and personal protective equipment mask and gloves in India. It also offers thermoplastic elastomers under the HYPRENE brand name; POM and LFT products; fiberglass honeycomb composite panels; polypropylene products; PA6/PA66 products; engineering plastics compounds; and high temperature resistant nylon/LCP. Kingfa Science & Technology (India) Limited was formerly known as Hydro S&S Industries Limited and changed its name to Kingfa Science & Technology (India) Limited in March 2016. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Chennai, India. Kingfa Science & Technology (India) Limited is a subsidiary of M/s Kingfa Science & Technology Co. Ltd China.
